name: Wing It (itch) (Unfocused Locust Games)
description:
For mobile devices: use a four-finger tap instead of ESC, and make sure to go into the settings menu and switch from “Mouse” to “Touch”.

Wing It is an arcade action game about Cupid. Use your powers of love to save the G.U.Y.S. from extinction. Swipe, hold, and release to combine two G.U.Y.S. into one young one! With a bangin' chiptune soundtrack and classic #retro visuals, Wing It is a mashup of exciting gameplay and humor, all in the palm of your hand (or on your PC).
